heuristics

Interface Heuristic

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DijkstraHeuristic, EuclideanHeuristic, ManhattanHeuristic, SemiEuclideanHeuristic

    public interface Heuristic
    Heuristics are used for estimating distances between two Cell objects. This is used especially in pathfinding.
    See Also:
    Pathfinder

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double calculateDistance(Cell cell1, Cell cell2)
      Returns an estimation between two Cell objects.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateDistance

        double calculateDistance(Cell cell1,
                       Cell cell2)
        Returns an estimation between two Cell objects. Note that the result should be commutative.
        Parameters:
        cell1 - the first Cell object.
        cell2 - the other Cell object.
        Returns:
        the estimation between the two specified Cell objects.
